name: Knighty Knight
description:
This game is a bare-bones concept of a game. All of the audio was made with the voices of the dev team (except percussion, we tried beat boxing, it was bad), and all of the art was drawn in crayon then digitized. We developed this game in about a month, we hope you enjoy it as much as we do!

Update 17/07/17: We took some time to make a couple of clarity changes to make the game more enjoyable!

Update 23/01/18: Finally replaced the last remaining non-crayon asset (the font), and updated some of the audio we weren't happy with.
